name: react-map-gl
description: A React wrapper for MapboxGL-js and overlay API.

scripts.start: (cd examples/main && (path-exists node_modules || npm i) && npm run start-local)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-es6
scripts.build-es5: mkdir -p dist && babel src --out-dir dist --plugins=transform-es2015-modules-commonjs,transform-runtime --source-maps inline
scripts.build-es6: mkdir -p dist-es6 && babel src --out-dir dist-es6 --source-maps inline
scripts.lint: eslint src test && npm run lint-yarn
scripts.lint-yarn: !(grep -q unpm.u yarn.lock) || (echo 'Please rebuild yarn file using public npmrc' && false)
scripts.publish-prod: npm run build && npm run test && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm run test && npm publish --tag beta
